sentence: Leading U.S. homebuilding company KB HomeKBH recently announced that it will incorporate a new energy saving smart technology called Carrier Cor thermostat in all the homes in its new communities in 2016.
Carrier Cor thermostat uses Wi-Fi technology and an advanced software to understand the energy needs of a home and the outside weather.
Carrier Cor thermostat utilizes this analysis to optimize the performance of the heating and cooling system for better efficiency and comfort.

It creates a smart home where residents can use CÃ´r thermostat's smartphone-like touchscreen or any smart device to monitor the heating or cooling system of their house or they can also let Cor's technology to auto adjust the temperature for them.
They can also monitor energy consumption.
Carrier Cor thermostat is the latest addition to the list of energy saving features offered by KB Home, such as WaterSense labeled fixtures.
While these energy saving features lower the utility bills of homeowners over the years, they are also environment-friendly.
KB Home operates through its operational business model - KBnxt - by which construction is initiated only after a purchase agreement has been executed.
This helps the company incorporate the demands and preference of the consumers.
KBnxt appeals particularly to high-income consumers.
This high-income group likes to enjoy the flexibility to design their homes and is ready to pay more for the same, thus driving the average selling price and revenues.
KB Home is thus opening more design studios, expanding the size of existing stores and introducing new displays in a bid to entice these customers.
Investors interested in the construction sector can consider The Home Depot, Inc. HD , TRI Pointe Group, Inc. TPH and Lennar Corporation LEN .
All three companies carry a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
